description:
Sekimoto is a teacher at the same cram school where http://anidb.net/ch94422 [Azusagawa Sakuta] and http://anidb.net/ch96609 [Futaba Rio] work part-time.
In episode 4 it is implied that he has made some indecent moves on one of the students, namely http://anidb.net/ch147531 [Himeji Sara]. He is then shown being escorted out by the cram school director.
name: Sekimoto
